source: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
hypothesis: સમાજીકરણના મહત્વને સમજાવવા માટે ઉપયોગમાં લેવાતી સામાન્ય પદ્ધતિઓમાંની એક એ છે કે બાળકોના કેટલાક કમનસીબ કેસો જે ઉપેક્ષા, કમનસીબી, અથવા ઇરાદાપૂર્વકના દુર્વ્યવહાર દ્વારા પસાર થયા હતા, પુખ્ત વયના લોકો જ્યારે મોટા થતા હતા ત્યારે તેમના દ્વારા સમાજીકરણ કરવામાં આવતા ન હતા.

source: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.
hypothesis: നിങ്ങൾ ആക്ഷൻ അടുത്ത് ആഗ്രഹിക്കുന്നുവെങ്കിൽ നിങ്ങൾ സംഗീതഅടുത്ത് ഒരു ക്യാമ്പിംഗ് സൈറ്റ് ലഭിക്കാൻ നേരത്തെ നേടാൻ പോകുന്നു.

source: She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away.
hypothesis: त्यांनी अधिकाऱ्यांना 500 फूट अंतरावर असलेल्या त्यांच्या ब्लॅक ओल्ड्स मोबाईल इंट्रिगकडे लक्ष देण्याचे निर्देश दिले.

source: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
hypothesis: जर तुम्हाला देशाच्या रस्त्यावरगाडी चालवायची सवय नसेल, तर तुमच्याविषयीसावधगिरी बाळगा: उंच श्रेणी, अरुंद मार्ग आणि तीक्ष्ण आलेख.

source: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.
hypothesis: પ્રાચીન રોમન ભોજનમાં એવા ખોરાકનો સમાવેશ થઈ શક્યો ન હતો જે પાછળથીસદીઓમાં અમેરિકાથી અથવા એશિયાથી યુરોપ આવ્યા હતા.

source: For theSpringboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
hypothesis: स्प्रिंगबॉक्सने सलग पाच पराभवांची मालिका गमावली.

source: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
hypothesis: ஜப்பானின் அணுசக்தி நிறுவனத்தின்படி, இந்த ஆலையில் கதிரியக்க சீசியம் மற்றும் அயோடின்அடையாளம் காணப்பட்டுள்ளன.

source: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.
hypothesis: ஒத்திவைப்பு அறிவிக்கப்படுவதற்கு முன்பு2020 க்கானஉங்கள் விமானங்கள் மற்றும் தங்குமிடங்களை நீங்கள் முன்பதிவு செய்தால், உங்களுக்கு ஒரு தந்திரமான சூழ்நிலை இருக்கலாம்.

source: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
hypothesis: துணி மிகவும் சூடாக மாற அனுமதிக்காதபடி கவனமாக இருங்கள் (இது சுருக்கத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும், அல்லது தீவிர நிகழ்வுகளில், தீக்காயத்தைஏற்படுத்தும்).

source: Generally speaking, two behaviors can emerge as managers begin to lead their former peers. One end of the spectrum is trying to remain “one of the guys” (or gals).
hypothesis: आम तौर पर, जब प्रबंधक अपने पूर्व साथियों का नेतृत्व करना शुरू करते हैं तो दो व्यवहार सामने आ सकते हैं। स्पेक्ट्रम का एक छोर "लोगों में से एक" (या लड़कियों)बने रहने की कोशिश कर रहा है।

source: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
hypothesis: એક નિરીક્ષક દ્વારા બિશ્કેકને "અરાજકતા" ની સ્થિતિમાં ડૂબી જવાનું વર્ણન કરવામાં આવ્યું હતું, કારણ કે લોકોનાગેંગ શેરીઓમાં ભટકતા હતા અને ગ્રાહક માલના સ્ટોર્સને લૂંટી લીધા હતા.

source: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
hypothesis: . இந்த விலங்கின் முளைவெளிர் அல்லது கரோட்டினாய்டு நிற அடிப்பகுதியுடன்மேல் செஸ்ட்நட்-பழுப்பு நிறத்தில் இருந்தது என்று விஞ்ஞானிகள் கூறுகின்றனர்.

source: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
hypothesis: જાપાનમાં, પ્રથમ ચેરી બ્લોસમ પાર્ટીઓનું આયોજન સમ્રાટ દ્વારા ફક્ત પોતાના અને શાહી અદાલતની આસપાસના ઉમરાવોના અન્ય સભ્યો માટે કરવામાં આવ્યું હતું.

source: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
hypothesis: பெரும்பாலான மரணங்கள், நீரோட்டத்திற்கு எதிராக நீந்த முயற்சிக்கும் சோர்வின்காரணமாக ஏற்படுகின்றன.

source: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.
hypothesis: यह काफी स्पष्ट है कि मानव जाति की वैज्ञानिक और तकनीकी प्रगति के कारण दुनिया बहुत बदल गई है, और जनसंख्या वृद्धि और मानव जाति की असाधारण जीवन शैली के कारण समस्याएं बढ़ गई हैं।

source: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
hypothesis: क्रांति के बाद भी सभी पुरुष आवेदकों के लिए व्यवसाय खुले थे जिससे सबसे महत्वाकांक्षी और सफल व्यक्ति सफल हो सके।

source: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
hypothesis: તેમના કામની ગુણવત્તા અને વિગત એટલી જાણીતી છે કે તે ફિલાટેલિસ્ટ્સમાં બહુ ઓછા "ઘરેલું નામ" છે. કેટલાક એકલા તેમના કામના સંગ્રહમાં વિશેષતા ધરાવે છે.

source: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.
hypothesis: இருப்பினும், ஒரு நாடு தழுவிய சாலை நெட்வொர்க் ஒரு சில கார்களுக்கு மட்டுமே பொருளாதாரரீதியாக சாத்தியமில்லை, எனவே கார் உரிமையாளர் செலவைக் குறைக்க புதிய உற்பத்தி முறைகள் உருவாக்கப்படுகின்றன.

source: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
hypothesis: ஏஜென்சியின் வெற்றி விகிதத்தை உயர்த்தும் நோக்கத்துடன், தீர்க்க எளிதான, குறிப்பாக திருடப்பட்ட கார் வழக்குகளில்வளங்களை மையமாகக் கொண்ட கடந்தஎஃப்.பி.ஐ கொள்கைகளை வரலாற்றாசிரியர்கள் விமர்சித்தனர்.

source: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
hypothesis: സാമൂഹ്യവൽക്കരണത്തിന്റെ പ്രാധാന്യം വ്യക്തമാക്കുന്നതിന് ഉപയോഗിക്കുന്ന ഏറ്റവും സാധാരണമായ ഒരു മാർഗ്ഗം, കുട്ടികൾ വളർന്നുവരുന്ന സമയത്ത് മുതിർന്നവർ സാമൂഹ്യവൽക്കരിക്കപ്പെടാതെ, അവഗണന, നിർഭാഗ്യം അല്ലെങ്കിൽ മന ful പൂർവമായ ദുരുപയോഗം എന്നിവയിലൂടെ കടന്നുപോയ കുട്ടികളുടെ നിർഭാഗ്യകരമായ ചില കേസുകൾ വരയ്ക്കുക എന്നതാണ്.

source: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth,at times six miles wide.
hypothesis: ஆறு மைல் அகலத்தில் அமேசான்பூமியின் அகலமானநதியாகும்.

source: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
hypothesis: સફારી કદાચ આફ્રિકામાં સૌથી મહાન પર્યટન ડ્રો છે અને ઘણા મુલાકાતીઓ માટે હાઇલાઇટ છે.

source: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
hypothesis: एक उदाहरण के रूप में, मध्य पूर्व में अमेरिकी नागरिकों को यूरोपीय या अरब से भिन्न स्थितियों का सामना करना पड़ सकता है।

source: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.
hypothesis: ४.२-३.९ मिलियनवर्ष पूर्व ऑस्ट्रेलोपिथेकस जीवाश्मों में द्विपाद विशेषज्ञता पाई जाती है, हालांकि सहेलथ्रोपस सात मिलियन वर्ष पहले दो पैरों पर चल सकता था।

source: Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers.
hypothesis: കുട്ടികളെയും പ്രായമായവരെയും ഉൾപ്പെടെ ആറു തടവുകാരെ ഫിലിപ്പിനോ ഫോട്ടോഗ്രാഫർമാർനേരത്തേതന്നെ മോചിപ്പിച്ചു.

source: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
hypothesis: விமான சரக்குமூலம் பொருட்களை அனுப்பினால், சில வழித்தடங்களில் இறக்குதல்மற்றும் சுங்கச்சாவடிகளை கடந்து செல்ல பல நாட்கள் ஆகலாம்.

source: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label.
hypothesis: எனவே, வெறுமனே ஒரு லேபிளாக நோட்டேஷன் சேர்க்கப்பட்டிருக்கலாம்.

source: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-yearcourse abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
hypothesis: അനേകം കേസുകളില്‍, വിദേശങ്ങളില്‍ അന്താരാഷ്ട്ര കോഴ്‌സുകളില്‍ രജിസ്റ്റര്‍ ചെയ്താല്‍ നിങ്ങളുടെ വീടുകളില്‍ ഉന്നതവിദ്യാഭ്യാസം തിരിച്ചുവരാനുള്ള സാധ്യതകള്‍ ശരിക്കും മെച്ചപ്പെടുത്താന്‍ കഴിയും.

source: Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists.
hypothesis: રોલંડો મેંડોજાએ પ્રવાસીઓ પર એમ 16 રાઇફલ ફેંકીહતી.

source: An up-bowusually generates a softer sound, while a down-bow is stronger and more assertive.
hypothesis: മൃദുലമായ ശബ്ദം സാധാരണയായി ഉത്പാദിപ്പിക്കുന്നു, എന്നാല്‍ താഴേത്തട്ടില്‍ ബലമുള്ളതും കൂടുതല്‍ ബലമുള്ളതുമായ ശബ്ദം ഉണ്ട്.

source: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
hypothesis: വിദൂര സ്ഥലങ്ങളിൽ, സെൽ ഫോൺ കവറേജ് ഇല്ലാതെ, ഒരു സാറ്റലൈറ്റ് ഫോൺ നിങ്ങളുടെ ഏക ഓപ്ഷനായിരിക്കാം.

source: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
hypothesis: எல்ஸ்வொர்த் நிலம் (Ellsworth Land) என்பது பெல்லிங்சௌசென் கடலால் சூழப்பட்ட தீபகற்பத்தின் தெற்குப் பகுதியாகும்.

source: It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World.
hypothesis: यह हेनरी लुई गेट्स के पीबीएस स्पेशल वंडर्स ऑफ द अफ्रीकन वर्ल्ड के दौरान प्रमुख पड़ावों में से एक था।

source: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
hypothesis: പന്ത്രണ്ടാം നൂറ്റാണ്ടിൽ അതിന്റെ നില കുറഞ്ഞു, പ്രധാനമായും കുരിശുയുദ്ധക്കാർ ബൈസാന്തിയൻ വിപണികൾ വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്തതിനേക്കാൾ വിലമതിക്കുന്ന സിൽക്കുകളും സുഗന്ധവ്യഞ്ജനങ്ങളും പോലുള്ള സമ്മാനങ്ങൾ നൽകി മടങ്ങി.

source: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human.
hypothesis: एक अच्छी तरह से गोलाकार एथलीट, बाघ चढ़ सकता है (हालांकि अच्छी तरह से नहीं), तैर सकता है, बड़ी दूरी तक छलांग लगा सकता है और एक मजबूत मानव की ताकत से पांच गुना ज्यादा खींच सकता है।

source: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

source: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.

source: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
hypothesis: മൃതദേഹം ഒരു ദിവസമായി അവിടെ ഉണ്ടായിരുന്നതായിതോന്നുന്നുവെന്ന് പോലീസ് പറഞ്ഞു.

source: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

source: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
hypothesis: કૃપા કરીને યાદ રાખો કે તમે ચોક્કસપણે એક જનસંગ્રહ સ્થળની મુલાકાત લઇ રહ્યા છો અને એક એવા સ્થળની મુલાકાત લઇ રહ્યા છો, જેનો વિશ્વની વસ્તીના એક મહત્વપૂર્ણ ભાગનોઅર્થ છે.

source: New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.
hypothesis: नवीन राज्य प्राचीन इजिप्शियन लोक त्यांच्या पूर्वसुरींच्यास्मारकांवर आश्चर्यचकित झाले, जे तेव्हा एक हजार वर्षांहून अधिक जुने होते.

source: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
hypothesis: એડેકોયા ત્યારથી એડિનબર્ગ શેરીફ કોર્ટમાં છે તેના પુત્રની હત્યાના આરોપમાં.

source: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.
hypothesis: 2-3.9 மில்லியன் ஆண்டுகளுக்கு முன்பிருந்த ஆஸ்ட்ரலோபிதெகஸ் புதைபடிவங்களில் இருகால் சிறப்பு வகைகள் காணப்படுகின்றன, இருப்பினும் ஏழு மில்லியன் ஆண்டுகளுக்கு முன்பாகவே சேலந்த்ரோபஸ்இரண்டு கால்களில் நடந்திருக்கலாம்.

source: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
hypothesis: ഒഹിയോയിലെ ബ്ളൂ ആഷില്‍ 29 വയസ്സുള്ള ഡോ. മാലാര്‍ ബാലാസുബ്രമനിയന്‍തെരുവിനു സമീപത്ത് സ്ഥിതിചെയ്യുന്ന സിന്‍സിനാട്ടിയില്‍ നിന്ന് ഏകദേശം 15 മൈല്‍ വടക്ക് സ്ഥിതിചെയ്യുന്ന ബ്ളൂ ആഷില്‍ കണ്ടുപിടിച്ചു.

source: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
hypothesis: सबसे पहले, अधिकांश सवार एक एड़ी और एक मुलायम, काफी संकीर्ण, तल्ला के साथ सवारी जूते पहनते हैं।

source: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
hypothesis: ബെലിങ്ഷൗസെൻ കടൽ സ്ഥിതിചെയ്യുന്ന ഉപദ്വീപിന് റെ തെക്കുഭാഗത്തുള്ള പ്രദേശമാണ് എൽസ്വർത്ത് ലാൻഡ് .

source: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.
hypothesis: હર્શી અને ચેઝે બેક્ટેરિયામાં તેમના પોતાના ડીએનએને રોપવા માટે ફેગ્સ અથવા વાયરસનો ઉપયોગ કર્યો.

source: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
hypothesis: મુદ્દા મુજબ, સંયુક્ત રાષ્ટ્રના કેમ્પમાંથી કચરાને યોગ્ય રીતે સેનિટાઇઝ કરવામાંઆવ્યું નથી, જેના કારણે બેક્ટેરિયા હૈતિની સૌથી મોટીનદી આર્ટિબોનાઈટની સહાયક નદીમાં પ્રવેશ કરી શકે છે.

source: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
hypothesis: തുണി വളരെയധികം ചൂടാകാതിരിക്കാൻ ശ്രദ്ധിക്കുക (ഇത് ചുരുങ്ങലിന് കാരണമാകും, അല്ലെങ്കിൽ അങ്ങേയറ്റത്തെ സന്ദർഭങ്ങളിൽ, കരിഞ്ഞുപോകും).

source: Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).
hypothesis: ஆண்களை நிராகரிப்பதில் உறுதியாக இருங்கள், உங்கள் நிலைப்பாட்டில் நிற்கபயப்படாதீர்கள் (கலாச்சாரவேறுபாடுகள் இருக்கிறதா இல்லையா, அது சரியில்லை!).

source: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.

source: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
hypothesis: നേരത്തെ, റിങ്ങിന്റെ സിഇഒ ജാമി സിമിനോഫ്, തന്റെ ഗാരേജിലെ കടയിൽ നിന്ന് വാതിൽക്കൽ നിന്ന് കേൾക്കാൻ കഴിയാത്തപ്പോൾ കമ്പനി ആരംഭിച്ചതായി അഭിപ്രായപ്പെട്ടു.

source: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.
hypothesis: ஒரு களப் பயணத்தைப் பகிர்வது ஒரு பயணத்தில் பிரதிபலிக்கவும்எதிர்கால வகுப்புகளுடன் அனுபவங்களைப் பகிர்ந்து கொள்ளவும் ஒரு சிறந்த வழியாகும்.

source: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.

source: Generally speaking, two behaviors can emerge as managers begin to lead their former peers. One end of the spectrum is trying to remain “one of the guys” (or gals).

source: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
hypothesis: त्याचे काम इतक्या मान्यताप्राप्त दर्जाचे आणि तपशीलाचेआहे की तो फिलेटालिस्टमधील अगदी कमी "घरगुतीनावांपैकी एक"आहे. काही जण एकट्याने त्याचे काम गोळा करण्यात माहिर आहेत.

source: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre.

source: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island.

source: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!

source: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.

source: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

source: The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals.
hypothesis: உள்ளேநச்சுத்தன்மைக்கான சிறந்த அறிகுறி, திறந்தவெளி மருந்து பெட்டகம் அல்லது நச்சுத்தன்மை வாய்ந்த வீட்டு ரசாயனங்கள் இருக்கலாம்.

source: In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars.
hypothesis: ഈ ചലനാത്മക ഗതാഗത ഷട്ടിലില് എല്ലാവരും ഒരു തരത്തില്സ്വകാര്യ കാറുകളെ അടിസ്ഥാനമാക്കിയുള്ള ഗതാഗത സംവിധാനവുമായി ബന്ധപ്പെട്ടിരിക്കുന്നു, അതിനെ പിന്തുണയ്ക്കുന്നു.

source: Greenland was settled sparsely.In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
hypothesis: नर्स गानों में वे कहते हैं कि हत्या के लिए एरिक रेड आइसलैंड से निर्वासित किया गया था और आगे पश्चिम की यात्रा करते समय ग्रीनलैंड मिला और इसका नाम ग्रीनलैंड रखा गया।

source: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
hypothesis: തെരുവുകളിൽ ഒരു കൂട്ടം ആളുകൾ അലഞ്ഞുതിരിയുകയും ഉപഭോക്തൃ സാധനങ്ങളുടെ സ്റ്റോറുകൾ കൊള്ളയടിക്കുകയും ചെയ്തപ്പോൾ ഒരു നിരീക്ഷകൻ ബിഷ്കെക്കിനെഅരാജകത്വത്തിന്റെ അവസ്ഥയിലേക്ക് മുങ്ങുന്നതായി വിശേഷിപ്പിച്ചു.

source: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
hypothesis: એક ઉદાહરણ તરીકે, મધ્ય પૂર્વનાઅમેરિકન નાગરિકોને યુરોપિયન અથવા આરબોથી જુદી જુદી પરિસ્થિતિઓનો સામનો કરવો પડી શકે છે.

source: She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away.
hypothesis: तिने 500 फूट अंतरावर असलेल्या तिच्या काळ्या ओल्डस्मोबाईल इन्ट्रिगकडे अधिकाdirected्यांना निर्देशित केले.

source: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
hypothesis: തുണി വളരെ ചൂടാകാതിരിക്കാൻ ശ്രദ്ധിക്കുക (ഇത് ചുരുങ്ങാൻ കാരണമാകും, അല്ലെങ്കിൽ അങ്ങേയറ്റത്തെ സാഹചര്യങ്ങളിൽ, കരിഞ്ഞുപോകും).

source: Research in AI involves making machines to automate tasks that require intelligent behavior.
hypothesis: AIમાં સંશોધનમાં કાર્યોને સ્વચાલિત કરવા માટે મશીનો બનાવવાનો સમાવેશ થાય છે જેમાં બુદ્ધિશાળી વર્તણૂકની જરૂર પડે છે.

source: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floodsthat would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.
hypothesis: વર્ષ 1963માં ડેમ બાંધવામાં આવ્યા પછી મોસમી પૂરઆવ્યું હતું, જે નદીમાં કાદવફેલાવશે.

source: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

source: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.

hypothesis: ജപ്പാനിൽ, ആദ്യത്തെ ചെറി ബ്ലോസം പാർട്ടികൾ ചക്രവർത്തി തനിക്കും ഇംപീരിയൽ കോടതിക്ക്ചുറ്റുമുള്ള പ്രഭുവർഗത്തിലെ മറ്റ് അംഗങ്ങൾക്കും വേണ്ടി മാത്രമാണ് ആതിഥേയത്വം വഹിച്ചിരുന്നത്.

source: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
hypothesis: प्रणयरम्यतेच्या संदर्भात, भौगोलिक स्वरुपाची व्यक्ती आणि कालांतराने त्या भूगोलशी संबंधित प्रथा आणि संस्कृती निर्माण झाली आणि हे, समाजाच्या स्थानाशी सुसंगत असल्याने, अनियंत्रितपणे लागू केलेल्या कायद्यांपेक्षा चांगले होते.

source: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
hypothesis: സാംസ്‌ക്കാരിക shockം (ഹണിമൂണ്‍ ഘട്ടത്തില്‍ കുറവ്) എന്നത് വളരെ വേഗത്തില്‍ വീണ്ടും പ്രവേശിപ്പിക്കുന്നു, അത് കൂടുതല്‍ കഠിനമാകാം.

source: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.
hypothesis: तथापि, केवळ मोजक्या मोटारींसाठी देशव्यापी रस्ता नेटवर्क आर्थिकदृष्ट्या सक्षम नाही, म्हणून कारच्या मालकीची किंमत कमी करण्यासाठी उत्पादनाची नवीन पद्धती विकसित केली जातात.

source: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
hypothesis: जपानच्या आण्विक संस्थेनुसार, या प्रकल्पात रेडिओॲक्टिव्ह कॅसियम आणि ईयोडिनची ओळख पटवण्यात आली आहे.

source: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.
hypothesis: ഹെർഷിയും ചേസും തങ്ങളുടെ ഡിഎൻഎ ഒരു ബാകടീരിയയിൽ ഉൾനട്ടാൻ ഫാഗുകൾ അഥവാ വൈറസുകൾ ഉപയോഗിച്ചു.

source: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides.
hypothesis: புலிகள் மிக அதிகமான சமூகக் கோழிகள், பெருமிதம் என்று அழைக்கப்படும் பெரிய குழுக்களில் வசிக்கின்றன.

source: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
hypothesis: ஆனால் ஆச்சரியம் என்னவென்றால், இந்த பாதையின் பல பகுதிகளை விட, எடுத்துக்காட்டாக பென்சில்வேனியா காட்டுப்பகுதியை விட, இங்கு செல்போன் சேவை மிகவும் வலுவாக உள்ளது.

source: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
hypothesis: ഒരു നിരീക്ഷകൻ ബിഷ്കെക്കിനെ "അരാജകത്വം" നിറഞ്ഞ ഒരു അവസ്ഥയിലേക്ക് മുങ്ങുകയാണെന്ന് വിശേഷിപ്പിച്ചു, ജനക്കൂട്ടം തെരുവുകളിൽ അലഞ്ഞുതിരിയുകയും ഉപഭോക്തൃ വസ്തുക്കളുടെ സ്റ്റോറുകൾകൊള്ളയടിക്കുകയും ചെയ്തു.

source: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
hypothesis: ഇറ്റാലിയൻ ഭാഷയിൽ ഉച്ചാരണം താരതമ്യേന എളുപ്പമാണ്, കാരണം മിക്ക വാക്കുകളും എഴുതിയതുപോലെ തന്നെ ഉച്ചരിക്കുന്നു

source: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
hypothesis: മകനെ കൊലപ്പെടുത്തിയ കേസിൽ അഡെക്കോയ എഡിൻബർഗ് ഷെരീഫ് കോടതിയിൽ ഉണ്ടായിരുന്നു.

source: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
hypothesis: கண்டத்தில் இருந்து நீண்ட தூரம் இருப்பதால், பாலூட்டிகள் இந்தபயணத்தை மேற்கொள்ள முடியவில்லை. இதனால் காலாபகோஸில்முதன்மையான மேய்ச்சல்விலங்காக மாபெரும் ஆமை மாறியது.

source: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
hypothesis: फारसी मेंअपेक्षाकृत आसान और ज्यादातर नियमित व्याकरण होता है।

source: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
hypothesis: યુરોપ એક મહાદિવસ છે, જે તુલનાત્મક રીતે નાનો છે પરંતુ અનેક સ્વતંત્ર દેશો સાથેછે, સામાન્ય પરિસ્થિતિઓમાં અનેક દેશોમાં મુસાફરીનો અર્થ એ થશે કે વિઝા એપ્લિકેશન અને પાસપોર્ટ નિયંત્રણમાં ઘણી વાર પસાર થવું પડશે.

source: It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World.
hypothesis: ஹென்றி லூயிஸ் கேட்ஸின் பிபிஎஸ் ஆப்பிரிக்க உலகின் சிறப்பு அதிசயங்களின்போது இதுமுக்கிய நிறுத்தங்களில் ஒன்றாகும்.

source: Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately.
hypothesis: ஆலிவர் சாக்ஸ் தனது பத்திரிகையான குடியரசுத் தலைவர் உரையில், மூளைச் சேதத்தின் காரணமாக பேச்சுத் திறனை புரிந்து கொள்ள முடியாதவர்கள் எவ்வாறு உண்மைத்தன்மையைதுல்லியமாக மதிப்பீடு செய்யமுடியும் என்பதை சுட்டிக்காட்டினார்.

source: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.

source: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
hypothesis: જોકે, નવાઈની વાત એ છે કે અહીં મોબાઇલ ફોન સેવા માર્ગના અન્ય ઘણા વિસ્તારો કરતાં ઘણી મજબૂત છે, દા.ત. પેન્સિલવેનિયા વાઇલ્ડ્સ.

source: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.
hypothesis: പ്രകൃതിവിദഗ്ധരും തത്വശാസ്ത്രജ്ഞരും ശാസ്ത്രീയ ലേഖനങ്ങളില്‍ പ്രത്യേകിച്ചും ലാറ്റിനില്‍ ബൈബിളില്‍ ശ്രദ്ധ കേന്ദ്രീകരിച്ചു.

source: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

source: Most insects have the advantage of being able to fold their wings back along the body.

source: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.

source: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
hypothesis: പാര്‍ട്ടിയുടെ പരിസ്ഥിതി ബില്‍ 'സമ്പൂര്‍ണ്ണവും പൂര്‍ണ്ണമായുംഎഴുതാന്‍' പ്രധാനമന്ത്രിയുമായി ചര്‍ച്ച ചെയ്യുമ്പോള്‍ പാര്‍ട്ടികളുടെ പരിസ്ഥിതി ബില്ലില്‍ മാറ്റങ്ങള്‍ വരുത്താന്‍ ലേടണ്‍ആവശ്യപ്പെട്ടിരുന്നു.

source: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
hypothesis: 1976 தேர்தலின் போது அவர் கார்ட்டருக்கு வெளியுறவுக் கொள்கை குறித்து ஆலோசனை அளித்தார். பின்னர் 1977 முதல் 1981 வரை தேசிய பாதுகாப்பு ஆலோசகர் (NSA) என்ற முறையில் அவர் வெற்றிகரமாக ஹென்ரி கிஸிங்கர் பதவி வகித்தார்.

source: Adekoya hassince been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.

source: He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

source: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.
hypothesis: उनकी दूसरी दौड़, जायंट स्लेलम, ने महिलाओं की बैठक समूह में दसवें स्थान पर अपनी समाप्ति देखी, 4:41.30, 2:1.60 मिनट के संयुक्त रन समय के साथ प्रथम स्थान के फाइनल खिलाड़ी ऑस्ट्रियाई क्लाउडिया लोएश से और हंगरी के नौवें स्थान के फाइनल खिलाड़ी गोंगी दानी से 1:09.02 मिनट धीमी।

source: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day.

source: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt.
hypothesis: हालांकि जब कार ने टक्कर मारी तो तीन लोग घर के अंदर थे, लेकिन उनमें से किसी को चोट नहीं आई।

source: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel.

source: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

source: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
hypothesis: या कलमात दुरुस्ती करण्यापूर्वी सर्व राज्यांची एकमताने संमती आवश्यक होती आणि राज्य सरकारांनी केंद्र सरकारला इतके हलके घेतले की त्यांचे प्रतिनिधी अनेकदा अनुपस्थित होते.

source: Due to the long distance from the continent, mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
hypothesis: கண்டத்திலிருந்து நீண்ட தூரம் இருந்ததால் பாலூட்டிகளால் பயணம் செய்ய முடியவில்லை.

source: Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists.
hypothesis: ரோலான்டோ மென்டோசா தனது எம் 16 துப்பாக்கியைசுற்றுலாப் பயணிகள் மீது சுட்டார்.

source: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.

source: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides.
hypothesis: "പ്രൈഡ്സ്" "(Prides)എന്നറിയപ്പെടുന്ന വലിയ കൂട്ടങ്ങളായി ജീവിക്കുന്ന, ഏറ്റവും സാമൂഹിക പൂച്ചകളാണ് സിംഹങ്ങൾ."

source: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
hypothesis: विज्ञान का मुख्य लक्ष्य वैज्ञानिक पद्धति के माध्यम से दुनिया के काम करने के तरीके का पता लगाना है। यह विधि वास्तव में अधिकांश वैज्ञानिक अनुसंधानों का मार्गदर्शन करती है।

source: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

source: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

source: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
hypothesis: தீவுகளுக்கு வெளியே ஃபாக்லேண்ட்ஸ் நாணயத்தை மாற்றுவது கிட்டத்தட்ட சாத்தியமற்றது, எனவே தீவுகளை விட்டு வெளியேறுவதற்கு முன்னர் பணத்தை மாற்றவும்.

source: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides.

source: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.

source: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.

source: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.

source: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.

source: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and noancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.

source: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.

source: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.

source: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.

source: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
hypothesis: उनका काम इतनी मान्यता प्राप्त गुणवत्ता और विवरण वाला है कि वह डाक टिकट संग्रहकर्ताओं के बीच बहुत कम घरेलू नामों में से एक हैं।कुछ लोग अकेलेउनके काम को इकट्ठा करने में माहिर हैं।

source: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".

source: Nothing can be seen other than the clear, beautiful sky above and the many surrounding mountains. Very little of this world can be seen or heard from inside the cave.

source: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.

source: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

source: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.

source: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda.

source: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.

source: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife.

source: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.

source: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.

source: In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885.
hypothesis: 1683 में, किंग राजवंश (1644-1912) बलों ने ताइवान के पश्चिमी और उत्तरी तटीय क्षेत्रों का नियंत्रण लिया और 1885 में ताइवान को किंग साम्राज्य का एक प्रांत घोषित किया।

source: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
hypothesis: अगर उन्होंने हवाई जहाज से सामान भेजा हो, तो कुछ मार्गों पर उतारने और सीमा शुल्क से गुजरने में कई दिन लग सकते थे।

source: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
hypothesis: மற்றொரு வேறுபாடு என்னவென்றால், ஏழை மக்கள் மற்றும் பெண்கள் நாற்காலியில் அமர்ந்து உணவுசாப்பிட்டு வந்தாலும், பணக்காரர்கள் தங்களுடைய உணவு சாப்பிட்டுக்கொண்டால், தங்களுடைய பக்கத்தில்தங்களுடைய பாதங்களை ஏற்றிச் செல்வதை விரும்பினர்.

source: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
hypothesis: ஜப்பானில், முதலாவதாககெர்ரி பூசப்பட்ட கட்சிகள், அரசால் தான்மற்றும் ஏகாதிபத்திய நீதிமன்றத்தின் சுற்றுப்புறத்தில் உள்ள தீவிரவாதத்தின் பிற உறுப்பினர்களுக்கு மட்டுமே ஏற்பாடு செய்யப்பட்டன.

source: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
hypothesis: बुधवार की घटना से परे, Carpanedoने चैंपियनशिप में दो व्यक्तिगत दौड़ में भाग लिया।

source: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.
hypothesis: ஜியன்கார்லோபிசிசெல்லா தனது கார் கட்டுப்பாட்டை இழந்து, போட்டியை ஆரம்பிப்பதில் விரைவில் முடித்துவிட்டார்.

source: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
hypothesis: இந்ததாக்குதலுக்கு டேஷ் (ISIL) தீவிரவாதி தான் பொறுப்பு என சந்தேகிக்கப்படுவதாகபொலிசார் தெரிவித்தனர்.

source: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
hypothesis: ദ്വീപസമൂഹങ്ങളിലും തടാകങ്ങളിലും നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ഒരു യാർഡ്ആവശ്യമില്ല.

source: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
hypothesis: डॉ. मल्लार बालसुब्रमण्यम (२,)हे ओहियो या ब्लू Ashशमध्ये आढळले. सिनसिनाटीच्या अंदाजे १ miles मैलांच्या उत्तरेस, एका टी-शर्ट व अंतर्वस्त्राच्या कडेने तो अत्यंत जबरदस्त औषध असलेल्याअवस्थेत रस्त्याच्या कडेला पडलेला होता.

source: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
hypothesis: 802.11എന്‍ മാനദണ്ഡം 2.4 ജി.എച്ച്, 5.0 ജി.എച്ച്.എന്നിവയില്‍ പ്രവര്‍ത്തിക്കുന്നു.

source: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
hypothesis: ഭൂഖണ്ഡത്തിൽ നിന്നുള്ള വളരെ ദൂരം കാരണം സസ്തനികൾക്ക് ഗാലപാഗോസിലെ ഭീമാകാരമായ ആമയെ പ്രാഥമിക മേച്ചിൽ മൃഗമാക്കി മാറ്റുന്ന യാത്ര നടത്താൻ കഴിഞ്ഞില്ല.

source: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
hypothesis: മറ്റൊരു വ്യത്യാസം പാവപ്പെട്ടവര്‍ക്കും സ്ത്രീകള്‍ക്കും കസേരയില്‍ ഇരുന്ന് ഭക്ഷണം കഴിക്കുമ്പോള്‍ സമ്പന്നരായ പുരുഷന്മാര്‍ക്ക് ഒരുമിച്ച് ഭക്ഷണം കഴിക്കാന്‍ ഇഷ്ടപ്പെട്ടു.

source: Some people thought he was right but many people believed the opposite; that the Solar System moved around the Earth, including the Sun (and even the other stars).
hypothesis: कुछ लोगों को लगा कि वह सही है, लेकिन कई लोगों को विपरीत विश्वास; कि सौर मंडल सूर्य (और यहां तक कि अन्य सितारों) सहित पृथ्वी के चारों ओर चला गया।

source: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.
hypothesis: જોકે, રાષ્ટ્રવ્યાપી રોડ નેટવર્ક માત્ર થોડાકાર માટે આર્થિક રીતે લાભદાયકનથી, તેથી કાર માલિકીના ખર્ચમાં ઘટાડો કરવા ઉત્પાદનની નવી પદ્ધતિઓ વિકસાવવામાં આવી છે.

source: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
hypothesis: बेटांच्या बाहेर फॉकलंडच्या चलनाची देवाणघेवाण करणे जवळजवळ अशक्य आहे, म्हणून बेटे सोडण्यापूर्वी पैशाची देवाणघेवाण करा.

source: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
hypothesis: गवर्नर जनरल के कार्यालय के बाहर एक बम विस्फोट हुआ।

source: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
hypothesis: എന്നിരുന്നാലും, പാരമ്പര്യപ്രകാരം എല്ലാ സാമികളും വലിയ തോതിൽ റീൻഡെർ ഭർത്താക്കന്മാരിൽ ഉൾപ്പെട്ടിരുന്നില്ല.

source: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
hypothesis: എന്നിരുന്നാലും ഇത് അത്ര നിസ്സാരമല്ല.

source: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
hypothesis: രണ്ടു ആഴ്ച മുമ്പ് ട്രോഫി നേടിയ ആൾ ബ്ലാക്കിന്റെ അവസാന മത്സരമായിരുന്നു അത്.

source: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
hypothesis: புரட்சிக்குப் பின்னர் அனைத்து ஆண் விண்ணப்பதாரர்களுக்கும் திறந்திருந்ததொழில்கள்மிகவும் லட்சியமானமற்றும் வெற்றிகரமானவெற்றிக்கு அனுமதித்தன.

source: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends tomean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
hypothesis: પરંતુ, જો વધુ ક્વોલિફાયર ્સવિના ઉપયોગમાં લેવામાં આવે તો, આ શબ્દનો અર્થ મૂળ મુખ્ય ટાપુ જાવાના મધ્ય અને પૂર્વીય ભાગોનો ખોરાક થાય છે.

source: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.
hypothesis: विकसित देशों में आपको पानी की गुणवत्ता या पुल गिरने के बारे में ऐसी शिकायतें शायद ही कभी सुनाई दें।

source: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
hypothesis: രണ്ടാഴ്ച മുമ്പ് ട്രോഫി നേടിയിരുന്ന ഓൾ ബ്ലാക്ക്സിന്റെ അവസാന മത്സരമായിരുന്നു ഇത്.

source: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.
hypothesis: മുഖം മറച്ചാണ് പ്രതി കോടതിയിൽ ഹാജരായതെന്ന് പോലീസ് സൂപ്രണ്ട് ചന്ദ്ര ശേഖർ സോളങ്കി പറഞ്ഞു.

source: Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds.
hypothesis: शेवटी, अनेक लहान मांजरी (सैल पाळीव मांजरींसह) आहेत जेकीटक, उंदीर, सरडे आणि पक्षी यांसारख्या असंख्य लहान भक्ष्यखातात.

source: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.

source: Mass car ownership also leads to a higher incidence of accidents on the roads, which leads to the invention of new techniques in healthcare for repairing damaged bodies.
hypothesis: பெரும்பாலான கார் உடைமைகள்சாலைகளில் அதிக விபத்துகளுக்கு வழிவகுக்கின்றன.

source: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
hypothesis: വളർത്തുമൃഗങ്ങളിൽ നിന്നുള്ള മൂത്രത്തിന്റെ സാമ്പിളുകളിൽ സയനൂറിക് ആസിഡും മെലാമൈനും കണ്ടെത്തി, മലിനമായ വളർത്തുമൃഗങ്ങളുടെ ഭക്ഷണം കഴിച്ച് മരിച്ചു.

source: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
hypothesis: ദ്വീപുകൾക്ക് പുറത്ത് ഫാക് ലാൻഡ് സ് കറൻസി കൈമാറുക ഏതാണ്ട് അസാധ്യമാണ്, അതിനാൽ ദ്വീപുകൾ വിടുന്നതിന് മുമ്പ് പണം കൈമാറുക.

source: In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885.
hypothesis: १६८३ मध्ये, छिंग राजवंशाच्या (१६४४-१९१२) सैन्याने तैवानच्या पश्चिम आणि उत्तर किनारपट्टीच्या भागावर नियंत्रण मिळवले आणि १८८५ मध्ये तैवानला छिंग साम्राज्याचा एक प्रांत म्हणून घोषित केले.

source: After all, the leader is ultimately responsible for the success and failure of the team.
hypothesis: എല്ലാറ്റിനുമുപരി, ടീമിന്റെ വിജയത്തിനും പരാജയത്തിനും നേതാവ് ആത്യന്തികമായി ഉത്തരവാദിയാണ്.

source: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
hypothesis: पेरिसवासी अहंकारी, असभ्य और घमंडी होने की ख्याति रखते हैं।

source: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.
hypothesis: மெய்நிகர் பயணத்தை பகிர்ந்து கொள்வது ஒரு பயணத்தை பிரதிபலிக்கவும், எதிர்கால வகுப்புகளுடன் அனுபவங்களைப் பகிர்ந்து கொள்ளவும் ஒரு சிறந்த வழியாகும்.

source: Of course, the superprofits derived from the protracted exploitation of the Filipino people would constitute the basic gains of U.S. imperialism.
hypothesis: अर्थात, फिलिपाईन्सच्यालोकांच्या दीर्घकालीन शोषणातून मिळणारा प्रचंड नफा हा अमेरिकन साम्राज्यवादाचा मूलभूत फायदा होता.

source: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
hypothesis: तेज हवाएं, ओले, अत्यधिक वर्षा, और जंगल की आग गंभीर मौसम के रूप और प्रभाव हैं, जैसे कि गरज, बवंडर, जलप्रपात और चक्रवात।

source: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
hypothesis: आइपॉड के खराब होने के लगभग 60 मामले सामने आए हैं, जिसमें कुल छह आग लग गई और चार लोग मामूली रूप से झुलस गए।

source: Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).
hypothesis: ஆண்கள் நிராகரிக்கும்உறுதியாக இருங்கள், மற்றும் உங்கள் தரையில் நிற்க பயப்பட வேண்டாம் (கலாச்சார வேறுபாடுகள் அல்லது இல்லை, அது சரி இல்லை!).

source: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
hypothesis: 12-ാം നൂറ്റാണ്ടില്‍ ക്രുസാഡര്‍മാര്‍ക്ക് നല്‍കിയ സമ്മാനങ്ങള്‍, മസാലകള്‍ തുടങ്ങിയ സമ്മാനങ്ങള്‍ നല്‍കിയതുകൊണ്ടാണ് ഇതിന്‍റെ സ്ഥാനം കുറഞ്ഞത്.

source: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
hypothesis: री-एंट्री शॉक कल्चर शॉक की तुलना में जल्दी आता है (इसमें हनीमून का चरण कम होता है), लंबे समय तक रहता है, और अधिक गंभीर हो सकता है।

source: He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
hypothesis: ત્યારબાદ તેમને કેમ્બ્રિજની એડનબ્રુક હોસ્પિટલમાં ખસેડવામાં આવ્યા હતા.

source: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
hypothesis: તેમણે કટ માટે આંકડો નક્કી કર્યો ન હતો, કહ્યું હતું કે તે ચીનના આર્થિક ઉત્પાદન પર આધારિત બનશે.

source: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may haveruptured and are leaking.
hypothesis: ഇത് സൂചിപ്പിക്കുന്നത് യുറേനിയം ഇന്ധനമുള്ള കണ്ടെയ് നറുകൾ തകരാറിലായിരിക്കാം എന്നാണ് .

source: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.

hypothesis: ઘણી બાબતોમાંવિદેશમાં અંતરિયાળ વર્ષના અભ્યાસક્રમમાં નોંધણી કરવી ખરેખર તમારા ઘરે ઉચ્ચ શિક્ષણમાં પાછા આવવાની શક્યતામાં સુધારો કરી શકે છે.

source: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
hypothesis: कई मामलों में, विदेश में एक अंतर-वर्षीय पाठ्यक्रम में दाखिला लेने से वास्तव में आपके देश में वापस उच्च शिक्षा में प्रवेश करने की संभावना में सुधार हो सकता है।

source: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
hypothesis: તેમણે કપાતનો આંકડો નક્કી કર્યો નહોતો. તેમણે કહ્યું હતું કે, તેમને ચીનની આર્થિક ઉત્પાદકતા પર આધારિત બનાવવામાં આવશે.

source: New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.
hypothesis: പുരാതന ഈജിപ് തുകാർ തങ്ങളുടെ മുൻകാല സ് മാരകങ്ങളിൽഅത്ഭുതംകൂറി.

source: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima(Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
hypothesis: तसेच उत्तरेकडे मॅरिऑनच्या महान पवित्रस्थानाला (मंदिराला) भेट द्या.

source: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
hypothesis: એક કરી માંસ અથવા શાકભાજી સાથે જડીબુટ્ટીઓ અને મસાલા પર આધારિત વાનગી છે.

source: As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in.

source: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.

source: It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
hypothesis: बहुतांश इव्हेंट तिकिटांची किंमत 2500 आणि 130,000 दरम्यान असेल अशी अपेक्षा आहे, ज्यामध्ये सामान्य तिकिटांची किंमत सुमारे 7,000 आहे.

source: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
hypothesis: कृपया लक्षात ठेवा की तुम्ही एका सामूहिक कबरीला भेट देत आहात.तसेच जगाच्या लोकसंख्येच्या लक्षणीय भागासाठी जवळजवळ अतुलनीय महत्त्व असलेली ही जागा आहे.

source: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.

source: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

source: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.
hypothesis: செப்டம்பர் 17,1939ல்போலந்தின் பாதுகாப்பு ஏற்கனவே உடைந்துவிட்டது. ருமேனிய பாலத்தில்பின்வாங்கி மறுசீரமைப்பதுதான் ஒரே நம்பிக்கை.

source: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century.

source: Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds.
hypothesis: आखिरकार, कईछोटी बिल्लियाँ हैं (जिसमें ढीली पालतू बिल्लियाँ भी शामिल हैं) जो कीड़ों, कृंतकों, छिपकलियों और पक्षियों जैसे कईछोटे शिकार खाती हैं ।

source: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

source: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
hypothesis: എജന്‍സിയുടെ വിജയ നിരക്ക് വര്‍ദ്ധിപ്പിക്കുകയെന്ന ലക്ഷ്യത്തോടെ, പ്രത്യേകിച്ചും മോഷ്ടിച്ച കാര്‍ കേസുകള്‍ പരിഹരിക്കാന്‍ എളുപ്പമായ കേസുകളില്‍ വിഭവങ്ങള്‍ കേന്ദ്രീകരിക്കുന്നതിന് മുന്‍കാല എഫ്.ബി.ഐ നയങ്ങളെ ചരിത്രകാരന്മാര്‍ അപലപിച്ചു.

source: Technology offers the solution with virtual field trips. Students can look at museum artifacts, visit an aquarium, or admire beautiful art while sitting with their class.

source: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.

source: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
hypothesis: ശൈത്യകാലത്ത് നിങ്ങൾ ആർട്ടിക് അല്ലെങ്കിൽ അന്റാർട്ടിക് പ്രദേശങ്ങൾ സന്ദർശിക്കുകയാണെങ്കിൽ നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ധ്രുവരാത്രി അനുഭവപ്പെടും, അതായത് സൂര്യൻ ചക്രവാളത്തിന് മുകളിൽ ഉദിക്കുന്നില്ല.

source: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
hypothesis: റൊമാന്റിസിസത്തിന്റെ പശ്ചാത്തലത്തിൽ, ഭൂമിശാസ്ത്രം രൂപപ്പെടുത്തിയ വ്യക്തികൾ, കാലക്രമേണ ആ ഭൂമിശാസ്ത്രവുമായി ബന്ധപ്പെട്ട ആചാരങ്ങളും സംസ്കാരവും ഉയർന്നുവന്നു, ഇവ സമൂഹത്തിന്റെ സ്ഥാനവുമായി പൊരുത്തപ്പെടുന്നതിനാൽ, ഏകപക്ഷീയമായി അടിച്ചേൽപ്പിക്കപ്പെട്ട നിയമങ്ങളേക്കാൾ മികച്ചതായിരുന്നു.

source: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.
hypothesis: બીજા સેટમાં ડેલ પોટ્રોએ શરૂઆતમાં જ 6-6 થી લીડમેળવી લીધી હતી.

source: By 1976, thirty percent of Machu Picchu had been restored and restoration continues till today.
hypothesis: 1976 સુધીમાં, માચુ ચિચુના 30 ટકા ભાગને પુનઃસ્થાપિત કરવામાં આવ્યા હતા અને આજે પણ પુનઃસ્થાપન ચાલુ છે.

source: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
hypothesis: जांच करें कि आप जिस बस के बारे में सोच रहे हैं वह हेब्रोन में जाएगी और न कि केवल पास के यहूदी बस्ती किरयात अरबा में जाएगी।

source: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
hypothesis: பாரம்பரியமாக கூட, எல்லாசாமிகளும்பெரிய அளவிலான கலைமான்வளர்ப்பில்ஈடுபடவில்லை, ஆனால்மீன்பிடித்தல், வேட்டை மற்றும் ஒத்தவற்றிலிருந்து வாழ்ந்தவர்கள், கலைமான் பெரும்பாலும்வரைவு விலங்குகளாகஇருந்தனர்.

source: Generally speaking, two behaviors can emerge as managers begin to lead their former peers. One end of the spectrum is trying to remain “one of the guys” (or gals).
hypothesis: सर्वसाधारणपणे, व्यवस्थापक त्यांच्या पूर्वीच्या समवयस्कांचे नेतृत्व करण्यास सुरवातकरतात म्हणून दोन वर्तने उदयास येऊ शकतात. स्पेक्ट्रमचा एक टोक म्हणजे "एक मुलगा" (किंवा गॅल्स) राहण्याचा प्रयत्न करीत आहे.

source: Curtis Cooper, a mathematician and computer science professor at the University of Central Missouri, has discovered the largest known prime number to date on January 25.
hypothesis: સેન્ટ્રલ મિઝોરી યુનિવર્સિટીના ગણિતશાસ્ત્રી અને કમ્પ્યુટર વિજ્ professorાનના પ્રોફેસર કર્ટિસ કૂપરને 25 જાન્યુઆરીએ અત્યાર સુધીની સૌથી મોટી જાણીતી મુખ્ય સંખ્યા મળી છે.

source: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
hypothesis: എന്നിരുന്നാലും, പരമ്പരാഗതമായി പോലും, എല്ലാ Sámi വലിയ തോതിലുള്ള റെയിൻഡീർ പരിപാലനത്തിൽ ഏർപ്പെട്ടിട്ടില്ല, എന്നാൽ മത്സ്യബന്ധനം, വേട്ടയാടൽ, സമാനമായത് എന്നിവയിൽ നിന്ന് ജീവിച്ചു, റെയിൻഡീർ കൂടുതലും ഡ്രാഫ്റ്റ് മൃഗങ്ങളായി ഉണ്ടായിരുന്നു.

source: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
hypothesis: ഗവർണർ ജനറലിന്റെ ഓഫീസിന് പുറത്ത് ഒരു ബോംബ് പൊട്ടിത്തെറിച്ചു.

source: Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face.
hypothesis: एडगर वेगुइला को हाथ और जबड़े के घाव मिले जबकि क्रिस्टोफर श्नाइडर को चेहरे के लिए पुनर्निर्माण शल्य चिकित्सा की आवश्यकता थी।

source: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
hypothesis: यदि आप ग्रामीण सड़कों पर ड्राइविंग करने के आदी नहीं हैं, तो अपने बारे में अपनी बुद्धि बनाए रखेंःखड़ी श्रेणियां, संकीर्ण गलियां और तीखे वक्र प्रमुख हैं।

source: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
hypothesis: મુકદ્દમા અનુસાર, યુએન કેમ્પમાંથી કચરો યોગ્ય રીતે સેનિટાઇઝ કરવામાં આવ્યો ન હતો, જેના કારણે બેક્ટેરિયા હૈતીના સૌથી મોટાનદી એર્ટિબોનિકનદીના પ્રવાહમાંપ્રવેશ્યો હતો.

source: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

source: It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands.

hypothesis: கார் பாதித்தபோதுமூன்று பேர் வீட்டிற்குள் இருந்தபோதிலும், அவர்கள் யாரும் காயமடையவில்லை.

source: Parisians have a reputation for beingegocentric, rude and arrogant.
hypothesis: பாரிசியர்கள் சுயநலவாதிகள், முரட்டுத்தனமானவர்கள், ஆணவக்காரர்கள் என்று புகழ்பெற்றவர்கள்.

source: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.
hypothesis: தூங்குவதற்கு முன்பு நிறைய திரவம் (குறிப்பாக தண்ணீர் அல்லது தேநீர், ஒரு அறியப்பட்ட சிறுநீர் கழித்தல்) குடிப்பது மற்ற பயோரிதம் அடிப்படையிலானவிருப்பங்களில்அடங்கும், இதனால் ஒருவர் சிறுநீர் கழிக்க வேண்டிய கட்டாயம் ஏற்படும்.

source: Neurobiological data provide physical evidence for a theoretical approach to the investigation of cognition. Therefore it narrows the research area and makes it much more exact.
hypothesis: તેથી તે સંશોધન ક્ષેત્રને ફેરવે છે અને તેને વધુ ચોક્કસ બનાવે છે.

source: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
hypothesis: கண்டத்தில் இருந்து நீண்ட தூரம் இருந்ததால், பாலூட்டிகள் மாபெரும் ஆமையை கலபகோஸில் முதன்மை மேய்ச்சல் விலங்காக மாற்றும் பயணத்தைமேற்கொள்ள முடியவில்லை.

source: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
hypothesis: जर त्यांनी वस्तू हवाई मार्गाने पाठवल्या असतील तर काही मार्गांवर माल उतरवण्यासाठी आणि सीमाशुल्कातून जाण्यासाठी अनेकदिवस लागू शकतात.

source: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
hypothesis: એલ્સવર્થ લેન્ડ એ ટાપુની દક્ષિણે આવેલો વિસ્તાર છે, જે બેલિંગશેનસમુદ્રથી ઘેરાયેલો છે.

source: Scientists think that ocelots follow and find animals to eat (prey) by smell, sniffing for where they've been on the ground.
hypothesis: वैज्ञानिकों को लगता है कि ocelots का पालन करें और जानवरों को खाने के लिए (शिकार) गंध से, जहां वे जमीन पर किया गया है के लिए सूंघने लगता है ।

source: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides.
hypothesis: சிங்கங்கள்தான் மிகவும் சமுதாய பூனைகள்.

source: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.
hypothesis: પોલીસ અધિક્ષક ચંદ્રશેખર સોલંકીએ જણાવ્યું હતું કે આરોપીઓ ચહેરો ઢાંકીને કોર્ટમાં હાજર થયા હતા.

source: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
hypothesis: 7 મિલિયનની વસતી સાથે ઇસ્તાંબુલ પછી આ તુર્કીનું ત્રીજું સૌથી મોટું શહેર છે, જે બીજા નંબરનું સૌથી મોટું બંદર છે અને ખૂબ જ સારું પરિવહન કેન્દ્ર છે.

source: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing inÜrümqi.
hypothesis: પ્રારંભિક અહેવાલો કહે છે કે Ürümqiઇમરજન્સી લેન્ડિંગનો ઇનકાર કરવામાં આવ્યા બાદ વિમાનને અફઘાનિસ્તાન પાછા વાળવામાં આવ્યું હતું.

source: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
hypothesis: ചന്ദ്രൻ ഭൂമിയിൽ വലിച്ചെറിയുകയും വേലിയേറ്റമുണ്ടാക്കുകയും ചെയ്യുന്നതുപോലെ, ക്ഷീരപഥം ധനു ഗാലക്സിയിൽ ഒരു ശക്തിപ്രയോഗിക്കുന്നു.

source: During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne.
hypothesis: इस अवधि के दौरान सिंहासन के लिए लड़ने वाले कई रईसों के बीच भयंकर युद्ध हुआ।

source: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
hypothesis: इज़मिर लगभग 3.7 मिलियन की आबादी वाला तुर्की का तीसरा सबसे बड़ा शहर है, जो इस्तांबुल के बाद दूसरा सबसे बड़ा बंदरगाह है, और एक बहुत अच्छा परिवहन केंद्र है।

source: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
hypothesis: पुरानंतर पाण्याची पातळी काही फूटच वाढेल, पण खाली खचलेल्या वाळूच्या पट्ट्या पूर्ववत करण्यासाठी ते पुरेसे ठरेल, अशी अधिकाऱ्यांना आशा आहे.

source: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
hypothesis: സ്പ്രിംങ് ബോക്കുകള്‍ക്ക് വേണ്ടി, അത് അഞ്ചു മാച്ച് നഷ്ടപ്പെടാന്‍ അവസാനിച്ചു.

source: The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals.
hypothesis: ആന്തരിക വിഷാംശത്തിന്‍റെ ഏറ്റവും മികച്ച ലക്ഷണം, മരുന്നുകള്‍ അല്ലെങ്കില്‍ വിഷാംശമുള്ള വീടുകളില്‍രാസവസ്തുക്കള്‍ അടങ്ങിയ ഒരു തുറന്ന കണ്ടെയ്നര്‍ ഉണ്ടാകാം.

source: Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna.
hypothesis: साथी पहलवानों ने भी लूना को श्रद्धांजलि दी।

source: Hydrogen ions are protons that had their electrons stripped off them (since Hydrogen atoms consist of one proton and one electron).
hypothesis: हाइड्रोजन आयन प्रोटॉन होते हैं जिनके इलेक्ट्रॉन छीन लिए जाते हैं (क्योंकि हाइड्रोजन परमाणुओं में एक प्रोटॉन और एक इलेक्ट्रॉन होता है) ।

source: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.
hypothesis: જો કે, રાષ્ટ્રવ્યાપી માર્ગ નેટવર્ક ફક્ત મુઠ્ઠીભર કાર માટે આર્થિક રીતે સધ્ધરનથી, તેથી કારની માલિકીના ખર્ચમાં ઘટાડો કરવા માટે ઉત્પાદનની નવી પદ્ધતિઓ વિકસાવવામાં આવી છે.

source: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.

source: After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap.
hypothesis: ജൂലൈ 4 ന് കോണ്‍ഗ്രസ് സ്വീകരിച്ചതിന് ശേഷം, കോണ്‍ഗ്രസ് പ്രസിഡന്റ് ജോണ്‍ ഹാങ്കോക്കും സെക്രട്ടറി ചാര്‍ള്‍സ് ടോംസണ്‍ ഒപ്പുവെച്ച കരാര്‍ ചില ബ്ലോക്കുകള്‍ ദൂരെ ജോണ്‍ ഡന്‍ലാപ്പിന്റെ പ്രിന്റിങ്ങ് ഷോപ്പിലേക്ക് അയച്ചു.

source: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
hypothesis: காங்கிரஸ் 2005 நிதியாண்டில் ஆபாசமான முயற்சிக்கு நிதி யளிக்கத்தொடங்கியது மற்றும் எஃப்.பி.ஐ வயது வந்தோருக்கான ஆபாசத்திற்கு10 முகவர்களை ஒதுக்க வேண்டும் என்று குறிப்பிட்டது.

source: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.
hypothesis: इतर बायोरिदम-आधारित पर्यायांमध्ये झोपेच्या आधी बरेच द्रव (विशेषत: पाणी किंवा चहा, एक ज्ञात लघवीचे प्रमाण वाढवणारा पदार्थ) पिणे समाविष्ट आहे, एखाद्याला लघवी होण्यास भाग पाडते.

source: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
hypothesis: മറ്റൊരു വ്യത്യാസം, ദരിദ്രരും സ്ത്രീയും കസേരയിൽഇരിക്കുമ്പോൾ ഭക്ഷണം കഴിക്കുമ്പോൾ,ധനികർ ഒരുമിച്ച് വിരുന്നു കഴിക്കാൻ ഇഷ്ടപ്പെടുന്നു, അവിടെ ഭക്ഷണം കഴിക്കുമ്പോൾ അവർ വശങ്ങളിൽ വിശ്രമിക്കും.

source: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
hypothesis: जापान की परमाणु एजेंसी के अनुसार,पौधे पर रेडियोधर्मीकैसियम और आयोडीन की पहचान की गई है।

source: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
hypothesis: रिंगने एडीटी कॉर्पोरेशन या प्रतिस्पर्धी सुरक्षाकंपनीबरोबरखटलाही निकाली काढला.

source: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
hypothesis: இத்தாலி மற்றும் உலகின் மற்ற பல நகரங்களில், குறிப்பாக போலந்தில், இதே போன்ற அமைப்புகள் உருவாக்கப்பட்டுள்ளன. அவை ஏராளமான மக்கள்பார்வையிட்டன.

source: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
hypothesis: रिंग ने प्रतिस्पर्धी सुरक्षा कंपनी, एडीटी कॉर्पोरेशन के साथ एक मुकदमे का भी निपटारा किया।

source: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
hypothesis: ग्रीसमधील क्रिट आणि सँटोरिनी या मिनोअन शहरांच्या घरांमध्ये सांडपाणी व्यवस्थेचे अवशेष सापडले आहेत.

source: A couple may decide it is not in their best interest, or in the interest of their child, to raise a baby.
hypothesis: ഒരു കുഞ്ഞിനെ വളർത്തുന്നത് അവരുടെ ഏറ്റവും നല്ല താൽപ്പര്യത്തിനോ കുട്ടിയുടെ താൽപ്പര്യത്തിനോ അല്ലെന്ന് ദമ്പതികൾ തീരുമാനിച്ചേക്കാം.

source: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.
hypothesis: சில நேரங்களில் கோயில்களின் ஒரு பகுதியாக ஜிகுராட்ஸ்என்று அழைக்கப்படும் பிரமிட் வடிவ கோபுரங்கள் கட்டப்பட்டன.

source: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre.
hypothesis: 2002 में गोमा को न्यिरागोंगो ज्वालामुखी से लावा द्वारा नष्ट कर दिया गया था जिसने शहर की अधिकांश सड़कों, विशेष रूप से शहर के केंद्र को दफन कर दिया था।

source: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples frompets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
hypothesis: सायनायिक आम्ल आणि मेलामिन हे दोन्ही पदार्थ पाळीव प्राण्यांमध्ये सापडले जे दूषित पाळीव अन् न सेवन केल्यानंतर मरण पावले.

source: Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds.
hypothesis: இறுதியாக, பூச்சிகள், கொறித்துண்ணிகள், பல்லிகள் மற்றும் பறவைகள் போன்ற பல சிறிய இரைகளை உண்ணும் பல சிறிய பூனைகள் (தளர்வானசெல்லப் பூனைகள் உட்பட) உள்ளன.

source: He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion.
hypothesis: उन्होंने [वेल्स] मूल रूप से शुरू से ही हमसे झूठ बोला था। सबसे पहले, यह अभिनय करके कि यह कानूनी कारणों से था। दूसरा, यह दिखावा करके कि वह हमें सुन रहा था, अपनी कला को हटानेतक।

source: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.
hypothesis: સ્કાફોલ્ડ વર્ચ્યુઅલ અને વાસ્તવિક બંને હોઈ શકે છે, અન્ય શબ્દોમાં એક શિક્ષક સ્કાફોલ્ડનું રૂપ હોય છે, પરંતુ માઇક્રોસૉફ્ટ ઓફિસમાં આવું જ એક નાનું પેપરક્લિપ મેન છે.

source: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

source: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.
hypothesis: സഖ്യകക്ഷികൾ പരാജയപ്പെട്ടിരുന്നെങ്കിൽ, യൂറോപ്പിലെ മറ്റു രാജ്യങ്ങളെപ്പോലെ ജർമ്മനിക്കും ബ്രിട്ടനെ കീഴടക്കാൻ കഴിയുമായിരുന്നു.

source: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
hypothesis: பல சந்தர்ப்பங்களில், வெளிநாட்டில் ஒரு இடைவெளி ஆண்டு படிப்பில் சேருவது உண்மையில்உங்கள் சொந்த நாட்டில் உயர் கல்விக்கு திரும்புவதற்கான வாய்ப்புகளை மேம்படுத்தலாம்.

source: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.
hypothesis: 1963 मध्ये धरण बांधल्यानंतर, पावसाळ्यात आलेल्या पुरामुळे संपूर्ण नदीत गाळ पसरला होता.

source: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
hypothesis: അതുപോലെ, ഷെൻഗെൻ വിസ ലഭിക്കുന്നതിലൂടെ, ഷെൻഗെൻ അംഗരാജ്യങ്ങളിലെല്ലാം പ്രത്യേകമായി വിസ അപേക്ഷ നൽകേണ്ടതില്ല, അതുവഴി സമയവും പണവും കടലാസും ലാഭിക്കാം.

source: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
hypothesis: യൂറോപ്യൻ യൂണിയനിൽ ഈ വൈറസ് ബാധിച്ച ഏഴാമത്തെ രാജ്യമാണ് ഫ്രാൻസ്; ഓസ്ട്രിയ, ജർമ്മനി, സ്ലോവേനിയ, ബൾഗേറിയ, ഗ്രീസ്, ഇറ്റലി എന്നിവയെ പിന്തുടരുന്നു.

source: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.

source: Downhillsnowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.

source: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

source: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.

source: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.

source: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.
hypothesis: அது எனக்கு நியாயமாக தோன்றவில்லை. நிச்சயமாக அது நியாயமற்றது.

source: Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

source: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.

source: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

source: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.

source: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.

source: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.

source: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system.

source: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.

source: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.

source: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.

source: Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face.

source: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.

source: He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.

source: New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over athousand year old.
hypothesis: એ તો હજાર વર્ષ જૂનાં હતાં.

hypothesis: ജൂലൈ 4 ന് കോൺഗ്രസ് അംഗീകരിച്ചതിനുശേഷം, കോൺഗ്രസ് പ്രസിഡന്റ് ജോൺ ഹാൻ‌കോക്കും സെക്രട്ടറി ചാൾസ് തോംസണും ഒപ്പിട്ട കൈയ്യക്ഷര കരട് കുറച്ച് ബ്ലോക്കുകൾ ജോൺ ഡൺലാപ്പിന്റെ അച്ചടിശാലയിലേക്ക് അയച്ചു.

source: In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars.
hypothesis: ഈ ഊര് ജ്ജസ്വലമായ ഗതാഗത ഷട്ടില് , സ്വകാര്യ കാറുകള് അടിസ്ഥാനമാക്കിയുള്ള ഗതാഗത സംവിധാനവുമായി എല്ലാവരും എങ്ങനെയോ ബന്ധിപ്പിക്കപ്പെടുകയും പിന്തുണയ്ക്കുകയും ചെയ്യുന്നു.

source: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
hypothesis: જોકે પૂર ના થોડા ફૂટ પછી જ પાણીનું સ્તર વધશે, અધિકારીઓ આશા રાખી રહ્યા છે કે તે નીચેના પ્રવાહમાં ધોવાણપામેલા રેતીના સળિયાને પુનઃસ્થાપિત કરવા માટે પૂરતું હશે.

source: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
hypothesis: सर्दियों में अगर आप आर्कटिक या अंटार्कटिक क्षेत्रों में जाते हैं तो आपको ध्रुवीय रात का अनुभव होगा, जिसका मतलब है कि सूर्य क्षितिज से ऊपर नहीं उठता।

source: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
hypothesis: ചില റോഡുകൾ കേടുപാടുകൾ സംഭവിച്ചിരിക്കുന്നു.

source: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
hypothesis: சஃபாரிகள் ஒருவேளைஆப்பிரிக்காவில் மிகப்பெரிய சுற்றுலா டிராமற்றும் பல பார்வையாளர்களுக்கு சிறப்பம்சமாக உள்ளன.

source: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheatinghave been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
hypothesis: கிட்டத்தட்ட 60 ஐபாட் கருவிகள் செயலிழந்து போவது பற்றிய தகவல்கள் வந்துள்ளன. இதனால் மொத்தம் ஆறு தீ விபத்துகளும்நான்கு பேர்சிறிய தீ விபத்துக்களும் ஏற்பட்டுள்ளன.

source: He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.
hypothesis: मानवी वर्तनाचा अर्थ लावण्याची ही क्षमता घरगुतीकुत्र्यांसारख्या प्राण्यांमध्येही असू शकते, असेही ते म्हणाले.

source: In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars.
hypothesis: இந்த மாறும் போக்குவரத்து விண்கலத்தில்ஒவ்வொருவரும் தனிப்பட்ட வாகனங்களைஅடிப்படையாகக் கொண்ட போக்குவரத்துஅமைப்புடன் ஏதோ ஒரு வகையில் இணைக்கப்பட்டு ஆதரவளிக்கின்றனர்.

source: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
hypothesis: બિશ્કેકને એક નિરીક્ષક દ્વારા "અરાજકતા" ની સ્થિતિમાં ડૂબી જવાનું વર્ણન કરવામાં આવ્યું હતું, કારણ કે લોકોની ટોળીઓ શેરીઓમાં ફરતી હતી અને ગ્રાહક માલની દુકાન લૂંટતી હતી.

source: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
hypothesis: ഏജൻസിയുടെ വിജയനിരക്ക് വർദ്ധിപ്പിക്കുകയെന്ന ഉദ്ദേശ്യത്തോടെ എളുപ്പത്തിൽ പരിഹരിക്കാൻ കഴിയുന്ന കേസുകളിൽ, പ്രത്യേകിച്ച് മോഷ്ടിച്ച കാർ കേസുകളിൽ ശ്രദ്ധ കേന്ദ്രീകരിക്കുന്ന മുൻ എഫ്ബിഐ നയങ്ങളെ ചരിത്രകാരന്മാർ വിമർശിച്ചിട്ടുണ്ട്.

source: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".
hypothesis: അവന്‍ ആ വാര്‍ത്തകള്‍ 'രാഷ്ട്രീയതയും ശാന്തതയും' എന്നും പരാമര്‍ശിച്ചു.

source: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
hypothesis: फारसी के पासअपेक्षाकृत आसान और अधिकतर नियमित व्याकरण है।

source: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
hypothesis: મોટાભાગના મઠોમાં સ્ત્રીઓને તૈયારી વિના આવવાનીઆવરણ મળે છે, પરંતુ જો તમે તમારોપોતાનો, ખાસ કરીને તેજસ્વી રંગો સાથે લાવશો, તો તમને પ્રવેશદ્વાર પર સાધુ અથવા સાધ્વી તરફથી સ્મિત મળશે.

source: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
hypothesis: एक उदाहरण के रूप में, मध्य पूर्व में अमेरिकी नागरिक यूरोपीयों या अरबों से अलग स्थितियों का सामना कर सकते हैं।

source: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.
hypothesis: കാര്‍ഷിക വിദഗ്ദ്ധന്റെയുംഅവരുടെ കുടുംബത്തിന്റെയും ആവശ്യങ്ങള്‍ നിറവേറ്റാന്‍ ആവശ്യമായ ഭക്ഷണംഉല്‍പ്പാദനത്തിന് കൃഷിയാണ് അനുബന്ധ കൃഷി.

source: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
hypothesis: बुधवारच्या कार्यक्रमाच्या पलीकडे, कार्पेनेडोने चॅम्पियनशिपमध्ये दोन वैयक्तिक रेसमध्ये भाग घेतला.

source: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.
hypothesis: तथापि, देशभरातील रस्ते जाळे केवळ काही कारसाठीआर्थिकदृष्ट्या व्यवहार्य नाही, म्हणून कारच्या मालकीची किंमत कमी करण्यासाठी उत्पादन करण्याच्या नवीन पद्धती विकसित केल्या जातात.

source: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
hypothesis: ஏஜென்சியின் வெற்றி விகிதத்தை அதிகரிப்பதை நோக்கமாகக் கொண்டு, குறிப்பாக மோசமான கார் விஷயங்களை தீர்க்குவதற்குஎளிமையாக இருக்கும் வழக்குகளில் ஆதாரங்களை கவனம் செலுத்துவதற்காக கடந்த FBI கொள்கைகளைவரலாறு நிபுணர்கள்விமர்சித்தனர்.

source: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
hypothesis: अगर वे हवाई जहाज से माल भेजते थे तो कुछ मार्गों पर माल उतारने और सीमा शुल्क से गुजरने में कई दिन लग जाते थे।

source: An up-bow usually generates a softer sound, while a down-bow is stronger and more assertive.
hypothesis: वरचा धनुष्य सहसा मऊ आवाज निर्माण करतो, तर खालचा धनुष्य अधिक मजबूत आणि ठाम असतो.

source: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
hypothesis: झाडे ऑक्सिजन बनवतात ज्यामुळेमनुष्य श्वास घेतोआणि ते कार्बन-डायऑक्साईड घेतात ज्यामुळेमनुष्य श्वासोच्छ्वासघेते (म्हणजेच श्वास घेतात).

source: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
hypothesis: विज्ञान का मुख्य लक्ष्य यह पता लगाना है कि वैज्ञानिक पद्धति के माध्यम से दुनिया कैसे काम करती है। यह विधि वास्तव में अधिकांश वैज्ञानिक अनुसंधान का मार्गदर्शन करती है।
